name: BLOB RHYTHM
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Did you ever want to be a cute little blob? Well, now's your chance! Jump into a rhythm music adventure - alone, or with up to 3 of your friends!

Help these little blobs make a stunning performance so they can be jumping little superstars. See if you've got the groovyness it takes.

"Blob Rhythm" is a project developed for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 by 7 students in Unity. There was a time span of 1 week to complete it. It is released free for all on itch.io, so grab your keyboard and jam along!

Controls: Singleplayer:      

                                  Blue: Left Arrow

                                  Purple: Up Arrow

                                  Orange: Down Arrow

                                  Green: Right Arrow

Coop:                    

                                  Blue: Right arrow

                                  Purple: Space Bar

                                  Orange: Q Button

                                  Green: Left Mouse Button

SPECS:

Genre: Rhythm Game, Local Coop

Engine: Unity

Camera perspective: 2D

Art Style: 2.5D, cute, colourful

Platform: PC

Controls: Keyboard & Mouse
